text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to define the statutory blocking minority for a GmbH as 25.1% of the share capital, the mathematical threshold to block a 75% vote. The candidate answer explicitly states that with 25%, the investor will *not* have a statutory blocking minority for many matters (often 75% shareholder resolution threshold), but it never defines the exact threshold (25.1%) required to block a 75% vote, nor does it explicitly state that 25.1% is the blocking minority.", "criterion_id": "e4b68dc4-70d1-47c7-92c2-ab8969fc72e4"}
